source: RISC-V Privileged ISA Specification, Chapter 3, Section 3.1.6

parameters.name: SD
parameters.description: State Dirty - Read-only bit that summarizes whether either the FS, XS, or VS fields signal the presence of some dirty state
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly named in diagrams and descriptions; text states it is only meaningful with F or V extensions.

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_62_48
parameters.description: Reserved (WPRI - Write Preserve, Read Ignore)
parameters.reasoning: Labeled as WPRI/Reserved in RV64 layout; assigned unique name per convention.

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_47_43
parameters.description: Reserved (WPRI)
parameters.reasoning: Labeled as WPRI/Reserved in RV64 layout.

parameters.name: MDT
parameters.description: Machine Disable Trap - Written to 1 when entering M-mode from an exception/interrupt.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on Smdbltrp extension; exists in mstatush for RV32.

parameters.name: MPELP
parameters.description: Machine Previous Expected Landing Pad - Holds the previous ELP state.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on Zicfilp extension.

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_40
parameters.description: Reserved (WPRI)
parameters.reasoning: Labeled as WPRI in RV64 layout.

parameters.name: MPV
parameters.description: Machine Previous Virtualization mode - Prior virtualization mode when entering M-mode.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on H extension.

parameters.name: GVA
parameters.description: Guest Virtual Address - Set when a guest virtual address is written into mtval.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on H extension.

parameters.name: MBE
parameters.description: M-mode Big Endian - Controls data endianness in M-mode.
parameters.reasoning: Specified as existing only in RV64 (or mstatush for RV32).

parameters.name: SBE
parameters.description: S-mode Big Endian - Controls data endianness in S-mode.
parameters.reasoning: Requires S extension and specified as RV64 only.

parameters.name: SXL
parameters.description: S-mode XLEN - Sets the effective XLEN for S-mode.
parameters.reasoning: Only exists in RV64 layout; requires S extension.

parameters.name: UXL
parameters.description: U-mode XLEN - Sets the effective XLEN for U-mode.
parameters.reasoning: Only exists in RV64 layout; requires U extension.

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_31_25
parameters.description: Reserved (WPRI)
parameters.reasoning: Labeled as WPRI in RV64 layout for the lower half of the register.

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_30_25
parameters.description: Reserved (WPRI)
parameters.reasoning: Labeled as WPRI in RV32 layout.

parameters.name: SDT
parameters.description: Supervisor Disable Trap - Double trap control for S-mode.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on Smdbltrp extension.

parameters.name: SPELP
parameters.description: Supervisor Previous Expected Landing Pad - Holds previous ELP for S-mode.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on Zicfilp extension.

parameters.name: TSR
parameters.description: Trap SRET - Restricts SRET execution in S-mode.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on S extension.

parameters.name: TW
parameters.description: Timeout Wait - Restricts WFI execution.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on S extension.

parameters.name: TVM
parameters.description: Trap Virtual Memory - Restricts satp and VM instructions in S-mode.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on S extension.

parameters.name: MXR
parameters.description: Make eXecutable Readable - Allows loads from executable pages.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on S extension.

parameters.name: SUM
parameters.description: permit Supervisor User Memory access
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on S extension.

parameters.name: MPRV
parameters.description: Modify PRiVilege - Uses MPP privilege for translation and protection.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on U extension.

parameters.name: XS
parameters.description: custom eXtension Status - Summarizes state of custom extensions.
parameters.reasoning: Named field present in base layouts.

parameters.name: FS
parameters.description: Floating-point Status - Tracks state of FPU.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on F or S extension.

parameters.name: MPP
parameters.description: Machine Previous Privilege - Holds privilege mode prior to trap.
parameters.reasoning: Base M-mode field, always present.

parameters.name: VS
parameters.description: Vector Status - Tracks state of vector unit.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on V or S extension.

parameters.name: SPP
parameters.description: Supervisor Previous Privilege - Prior mode before S-trap.
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on S extension.

parameters.name: MPIE
parameters.description: Machine Previous Interrupt Enable
parameters.reasoning: Base M-mode field.

parameters.name: UBE
parameters.description: U-mode Big Endian
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on U extension.

parameters.name: SPIE
parameters.description: Supervisor Previous Interrupt Enable
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on S extension.

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_4
parameters.description: Reserved (WPRI)
parameters.reasoning: Labeled as WPRI/Reserved in both layouts.

parameters.name: MIE
parameters.description: Machine Interrupt Enable
parameters.reasoning: Base M-mode field.

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_2
parameters.description: Reserved (WPRI)
parameters.reasoning: Labeled as WPRI/Reserved in both layouts.

parameters.name: SIE
parameters.description: Supervisor Interrupt Enable
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly stated dependency on S extension.

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_0
parameters.description: Reserved (WPRI)
parameters.reasoning: Labeled as WPRI/Reserved in both layouts.

notes: mstatush bits 31:16 and 15:11 (WPRI) were observed in the RV32 diagram but not uniquely added to this flat list to avoid redundancy with RV64 reserved fields, unless requested otherwise. MDT/MPELP/MPV/GVA/MBE/SBE are mapped to mstatush for RV32 as per text.
